1: <error-prone>@@//yin//dbus</error-prone> las dbu ma <error-prone>pa</error-prone> nyid dang //me mtshams stan dang ldan pa <error-prone>yi//sgra</error-prone> yig i dang <error-prone>sbyor</error-prone> nas su//lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa <error-prone>yang //</error-prone>
2: sgra yig i dang <error-prone>sbyor</error-prone> byas te//tsheg drag lhan cig 'dod <error-prone>pa'o//de dag</error-prone> mda' rnon 'dzin ma la sogs pa <error-prone>grwa'i</error-prone> srin mo la sogs bzhi rnams <error-prone>kyi'o//me</error-prone> tog ma sogs 'dus pa dang //sgo <error-prone>srung</error-prone> ma
3: sogs 'dus pa <error-prone>ste//rtsa</error-prone> <error-prone>ba'i</error-prone> dkyil 'khor tshul <error-prone>gyis</error-prone> <error-prone>ni//ji</error-prone> bzhin yang dag 'byung <error-prone>ba'o//zhes</error-prone> bcom ldan 'das dpal thogs pa med pa'i shin <error-prone>tu</error-prone> dga' ba'i rgyal po rdo <error-prone>rje</error-prone> sems dpas

5: pa la sogs//dbus las <error-prone>bzhi</error-prone> pa gang yin <error-prone>pa//sgra</error-prone> yig a dang sbyor bar bya//dbus las dbu ma bzung ba <error-prone>dang //dbang</error-prone> ldan phyi rol gnas pa la//sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya//byang las <error-prone>bzhi pa</error-prone>
6: gang yin pa//rtseg mar de bzhin lci bar 'dod//dbus las dang po bzung ba <error-prone>dang //byang</error-prone> nas dbu ma yang yin te//dbus las tha ma dang sbyor ba//brgyad par yongs su grags pa yin//byang nas
7: tha mar de bzhin du//o yig me mtshams dang ldan <error-prone>pa//byang</error-prone> nas dang po yang yin te//dbus las dbu ma dang sbyor te//dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa <error-prone>yang //me</error-prone> mtshams 'dab ma bzung nas <error-prone>su//</error-prone>
